entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 12:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 in the Canada Bay area. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
